name: 跨國企業併購談判

Effective commercial negotiations techniques and best practices
Cross border M&A concepts, process, best practices
Application of effective negotiations techniques to M&A deals

methodologies.note: Explanation of and discussions on the key negotiations and M&A concepts, theories and best practices
